amendatorysection.catchline: Nebraska Arts Council; insure compliance prior to payment; manner.
amendatorysection.para: The Nebraska Arts Council shall inform the Director of Administrative Services that sections 82-317 to 82-329, 85-106 to 85-106.03, and 85-304 to 85-304.03 have been complied with for each project subject to section 82-319 before a warrant may be issued for payment.
